mapper.select: SELECT app_info.id AS AppinfoId,softwareName AS appName,versionSize,versionNo,publishStatus, valueName AS publishStatusName,downloadLink,apkFileName,app_version.modifyDate AS modifyDate FROM app_version INNER JOIN app_info ON app_info.id = app_version.appId INNER JOIN data_dictionary ON app_version.publishStatus = data_dictionary.valueId WHERE typeName='发布状态' and app_info.id=#{appId}
SELECT * FROM app_version WHERE appid=#{appId} ORDER BY modifyDate DESC LIMIT 1
